snippet: Marcus Thornton scored 15 of his 27 points in the fourth quarter against his old team and Joe Johnson added 18 points, helping the Brooklyn Nets overcome an injury to Paul Pierce in a 104-89 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Sunday night....

headline.print_headline: Thornton Scores 27 to Lead Nets Past Kings, 104-89
headline.main: Thornton Scores 27 to Lead Nets Past Kings, 104-89

lead_paragraph: Marcus Thornton scored 15 of his 27 points in the fourth quarter against his old team and Joe Johnson added 18 points, helping the Brooklyn Nets overcome an injury to Paul Pierce in a 104-89 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Sunday night.
